docs.title: Problem Statement
docs.text: This project aims to develop an online healthcare management platform that allows patients to book appointments easily, choose their preferred doctor, time, and location, and receive real-time updates on their booking status

docs.title: Solution Overview
docs.text:
The Healthcare Management System solves these problems by providing a centralized digital platform where:

  • Find verified doctors across specializations with details like experince.
  • Book appointment with doctors according to health condition.
  • Clinic and slot-based doctor appointment booking.
  • Learn about the diseases such as cancer, typhoid, skin diseases etc.,including symptoms and preventive measures.

This system will manage the bridge gap between paitents, doctors and healthcare education by making quality healthcare accessible, informed, and personalized for everyone.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Doctor listing with details (specialization, experience)
  • Clinic and slot-based doctor appointment booking
  • Online appointment booking
  • Secure user authentication (Sign-up / Login)
  • Health education content for awareness

docs.title: Back-End
docs.text:
• Framework:Node.js with Express(REST API).
  • Authentication:JWT (JSON Web Tokens).
  • Database:POSTGRESQL.
  • Encryption:bcrypt for password hashing.

docs.title: Front-End
docs.text: • Framework:React.

docs.title: Functional Requirements
docs.text: ID Functionality Description FR-1 Authentication JWT-based signup/login for Admin, Doctor, and Patient FR-2 Doctor Management Admin manages doctor accounts, availability, and status FR-3 clinic Management Fetch and display detail of clinic data FR-4 Appointments Management Patients book/manage appointments; doctors view/manage schedules FR-5 Health Education & Articles Stores health related articles like good nurtition

docs.title: FR-1: Authentication
docs.text:
• Secure signup/login using JWT
  • Password encryption (bcrypt)
  • Email verification
  • Role based Access control
  • Token validation for protected routes

docs.title: FR-2: Doctor Management (Admin Role)
docs.text:
• Add new doctor profiles
  • Update doctor information
  • Assign doctors to clinics
  • Deactivate/reactivate doctors
  • Search doctors by specialty, name, or status.

docs.title: FR-3: Clinic Management (Admin Role)
docs.text:
• Add clinics with name, address, timings
  • Update clinic details
  • Disable/enable clinics

docs.title: Patients
docs.text:
• Search doctors
  • Book clinic-based time-slot appointments
  • Cancel or reschedule appointments
  • View:
    • Upcoming appointments
    • Doctor-wise appointments
    • Clinic-wise appointments

docs.title: Doctors
docs.text:
• View day-wise appointment list
  • Cancel appointments with reason

docs.title: System Handling
docs.text:
• Appointment statuses:
    • Pending
    • Confirmed
    • Completed
    • Cancelled
  • Real-time slot locking to avoid double booking
  • Notifications for status updates

docs.title: Doctors
docs.text:
• Publish articles on nutrition, disease prevention, mental health, etc.
  • Edit and delete previously posted articles

docs.title: Patient
docs.text:
• Browse and read health education articles
  • Search articles by category

docs.title: Non-Functional Requirements
docs.text:
• Performance:The system should provide fast response times.
  • Security:All data should be secure to protect user privacy and system integrity.

docs.title: Booking Sequence
docs.text:
1. Patient -> Search -> select doctor -> select slot -> Confirm booking
  2. System -> Lock slot -> Create appointment record -> Notify doctor & patient
  3. Doctor -> Sees appointment on daily list

docs.title: Cancellation by Patient
docs.text:
1. Patient -> Cancel request
  2. System -> mark appointment cancelled -> free slot -> notify doctor

docs.title: Doctor Deactivation
docs.text:
1. Admin -> Deactivate doctor
  2. System -> Block new bookings for doctor
  3. System -> Check future appointments -> notify patients + admin -> follow chosen business rule

docs.title: Future Scope.
docs.text:
• Prescription Management: Allow doctors to upload prescriptions digitally.
  • Payment Gateway: Add secure online payment for appointments.

docs.title: Bussiness Use case.
docs.text:
The Cravia healthcare provides a centralized platform for handling all operations related to health like cure,awareness and booking appointment with the doctors.

  • Doctor Management This maintains all the information of the doctor,including their qualifications,specializations, experience, and availability.

  • Appointment Booking System. Paintent can book appointments through the platform by selecting the doctor based on the diseases you are suffering.

  • Health Education & Awareness. This platform contains educational content about various health topices like how to maintain good health.

docs.title: Functional Use Case
docs.text: This section describes the key use cases of the Healthcare Management System, outlining the actors, goals and main flows for each major function.

docs.title: UC-01: Patient — Register & Login
docs.text: Actor: Patient Goal: Create account and access patient features. Flow: Signup → Email verification → Login (JWT issued).

docs.title: UC-02: Patient — Search & View Doctors
docs.text: Actor: Patient Goal: Find a doctor by name, specialty, or clinic. Flow: Search → View doctor profile → See clinic assignments & available slots.

docs.title: UC-03: Patient — Book Appointment
docs.text: Actor: Patient Goal: Book a slot with a doctor at a clinic. Flow: Select doctor → Select clinic → Select available slot → Confirm booking → Notifications sent.

docs.title: UC-04: Patient — Cancel / Reschedule Appointment
docs.text: Actor: Patient Goal: Cancel or change a booked appointment. Flow: Choose appointment → Cancel/Reschedule → System enforces cancellation policy → Update status & notify doctor.

docs.title: UC-05: Doctor — View Day-wise Appointments
docs.text: Actor: Doctor Goal: See all appointments for a date. Flow: Open schedule → Select date → System lists appointments (time, patient, notes).

docs.title: UC-06: Doctor — Cancel Appointment
docs.text: Actor: Doctor Goal: Cancel an appointment (e.g., emergency). Flow: Select appointment → Cancel with reason → System notifies patient.

docs.title: UC-07: Admin — Add Clinic
docs.text: Actor: Admin Goal: Make a clinic available in the system. Flow: Create clinic record → Clinic visible for doctor assignment and patient search.

docs.title: UC-08: Admin — Add / Deactivate Doctor
docs.text: Actor: Admin Goal: Add new doctors and manage their active status. Flow: Create doctor profile → Assign clinic(s) → Optionally deactivate → System blocks new bookings if deactivated.

docs.title: Conclusion
docs.text: Cravia Healthcare represents the future of digital healthcare — merging accessibility, education, and personalized medical services in one platform. By connecting patients and doctors directly, it encourages better health management, early diagnosis, and greater health awareness.
